hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble.Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    The Player class represents a human player. A Player object stores information about the player's score, tray and tile in hand.
    Author:
    gergo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int score 
      private int tileInHand 
      private Tray tray 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Construct a new Player object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getScore()
      Returns the number of points gained by the player.
      int getTileInHand()
      Returns the tile code of the tile which is currently in the hand of the player.
      Tray getTray()
      Returns the Tray object representing the tray of the player.
      void setScore(int score)
      Sets the score of the player.
      void setTileInHand(int tileInHand)
      Sets the tile code of the tile which is currently in the hand of the player.

      • Player

        public Player()
        Construct a new Player object. Initializes it with no points, an empty tray and no tile in hand.
